backend/main.mo: Actor imports and includes the blob-storage mixin to expose storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping features to files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files and their roles in styling, configuration, and gallery functionality.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Guide detailing how to set up a custom domain for the IC app, including DNS and verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a warm neutral OKLCH color system, dark mode variables, and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout combining header, hero banner, uploader, and gallery sections.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Displays images in a responsive grid with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryI: Renders an image card with metadata, hover overlay, download option, and delete confirmation modal.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ImageUpl: Image upload component supporting drag‑and‑drop, validation, previews, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header and footer components showing branding and attribution footer.
frontend/src/config/runtime.ts: Generates runtime configuration for backend canister ID and host, supporting custom domains.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, logout, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for listing, uploading, and deleting images using the backend actor, with placeholder implementations until backend methods are available.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and a warm neutral color theme, plus global styles and a gallery grid layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, pending requests, image requirements, and metadata for build planning.
